N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.68 - Powers of board

State Regulations
(a) The board reserves the right to fix the dollar amounts for all of the charges
or fees described in these rules and regulations after: (1)
publishing a notice in each of the
officially designated district newspapers, once a week for three consecutive
weeks, that a change in the fee(s) or charge(s) is under consideration. Such
notice shall specify the date, time and place of the meeting of the board when
consideration of such fees may be anticipated: (i) the published notice shall include an
invitation for written public input to be submitted to the district at the
office(s) of the district designated therein; (ii)
no action on setting or amending such
changes in charges and fees shall occur for a period of 30 days following the
last date of publication of such notice; and
(2)
adopting a resolution fixing said fees or
charges at a regular public meeting of the board at which a quorum of the board
is present and at which a period for public comment has been
provided. (b) The board
reserves the right to grant, issue and renew special permits, and to fix the
fees therefor, and to modify the width of the access areas to be
granted. Notes
